excerpts: Picked up a pretty satisfying slice of cheese pizza on a weeknight.
They heat it up so its crispy how I like it.
Friendly staff.
They have ranch too, not the best ranch but, eh, what are you gonna do.
cheese pizza.author: Shruti D.
cheese pizza.review: Picked up a pretty satisfying slice of cheese pizza on a weeknight. They heat it up so its crispy how I like it. Friendly staff. They have ranch too, not the best ranch but, eh, what are you gonna do.

excerpts: It's a chicken, spinach, and feta cheese pizza.
cheese pizza.author: Shouka S.
cheese pizza.review:
Order the Castro Special!

Enough said.

No but really the Castro Special is so delicious! It's a chicken, spinach, and feta cheese pizza. 

I came here after a night of drinking with my friends. The pizza was flavorful, fluffy, and perfect amount of crust. Best part was that it wasn't super greasy!

excerpts: I decided to just go with the classic cheese pizza x2, which was a decent amount of food for the price.
cheese pizza.author: Ryan R.
cheese pizza.review:
Went here with some friends to grab a bite to eat after a night out. We were pretty tanked to say the least, and this was a perfect respite on a cold, rainy night.

I decided to just go with the classic cheese pizza x2, which was a decent amount of food for the price. I was happy too that they were able to just slightly warm the pizza up without having it be scalding hot.

Overall, this place isn't the best pizza you've ever had, but it's a solid option in the Castro.

excerpts: However, the slice of Cheese Pizza ($3) I had was good- nice and cheesy, and still so hot
it burned my mouth a bit despite giving it time to cool off.
Service was also super quick.
cheese pizza.author: Amy D.
cheese pizza.review:
3.5 stars but rounding down since they did NOT have sausage pizza available.. in the CASTRO!! However, the slice of Cheese Pizza ($3) I had was good- nice and cheesy, and still so hot it burned my mouth a bit despite giving it time to cool off. Service was also super quick. There are a few counter seats available inside, and plenty of sidewalk space to stand outside and eat as well. 

Overall, a good spot to go after drinking in the Castro, but they need to add a sausage option! Parking is difficult in this area, but street parking is available.

excerpts: The crust has the right "chew" to it, but (at least) the cheese pizza is completely flavorless.
If a pizza place can't get a plain cheese pizza right, it doesn't bode well for others.
cheese pizza.author: Paul L.
cheese pizza.review:
The crust has the right "chew" to it, but (at least) the cheese pizza is completely flavorless. If a pizza place can't get a plain cheese pizza right, it doesn't bode well for others.

I don't know how this place stays in business given that there are two MUCH better pizza places within a block, namely Escape from New York (Castro/18th) and Marcello's (Castro/17th).

excerpts: I had no intentions of getting my own..but after that bite....i walked up to the counter right away and got my own slice of cheese pizza.
cheese pizza.author: Monica H.
cheese pizza.review:
For some reason.....
Their greasy, big slice of pizza was suuuuuper duuuuper good after shots ot tequila. Yes.

My friend got a pepperoni, and i took a bite. I had no intentions of getting my own..but after that bite....i walked up to the counter right away and got my own slice of cheese pizza.

It was good. And cheap.

excerpts: And now, I'm vegan except for my once monthly splurge on their amazing pesto cheese pizza.
I always take one slice home, and before I've finished my walk home
I've eaten the massive slice
and I'm upset
I didn't either
savor it or 2. buy a second slice.
cheese pizza.author: Megan C.
cheese pizza.review:
I'm vegan. Or at least, I'm normally vegan.
And then I met Nizario's Pizza.
And now, I'm vegan except for my once monthly splurge on their amazing pesto cheese pizza. I always take one slice home, and before I've finished my walk home I've eaten the massive slice and I'm upset I didn't either 1. savor it or 2. buy a second slice.

excerpts:
Pepperoni pizza: awful
Cheese pizza: couldn't be more blend
Castro pizza: overpriced and always out
cheese pizza.author: NC B.
cheese pizza.review:
The drunken adventures I have to share from this shithole are endless.

Let me just say, kudos for being such smart business owners to stay open until after the bars close... Because this is really the only way and reason they get 99% of their business. Escape from new York around the corner which has WAY better pizza needs to open its eyes and realize they are making the dumbest business decision by closing so early in a neighborhood that breathers and lives during the after hours like Castro!

Nizario's pizza is absolutely gross. Just go during the day and you'll be able to tell why... it is dead. Queens who live in the Castro are sober and know better not to get anywhere near this shoebox hole in the wall during the daylight.

Service here is awful but the poor quality of the overpriced slice of pizza and expired rotten parmesan cheese on the side does it for me.

Alcohol intoxication is not a good enough reason for me to stumble upon this crack house... I must be on either crystal meth or crack to end up here..

Pepperoni pizza: awful
Cheese pizza: couldn't be more blend
Castro pizza: overpriced and always out

Do they have anything else on their menu? No


STAY AWAY!

excerpts: I like cheese pizza, and their cheese pizza and veggie pizza
were soooooooooo delicious!!!
cheese pizza.author: Nina M.
cheese pizza.review:
Are you drunk?

Hungry?

In the castro?

well I have found the perfect after clubbing dining place, and it is sooooooooooooooo tasty!!! I like cheese pizza, and their cheese pizza and veggie pizza were soooooooooo delicious!!!

excerpts: She ordered a cheese pizza for $2.75 which is a pretty good deal!
We shared it and I usually don't do cheese pizzas
but I enjoyed Nizario's.
The pizza was nice and crisp.
cheese pizza.author: Darryl P.
cheese pizza.review:
My friend wanted to grab a quick bite and said this pizza joint was good so we stopped by here after a night out on the town. We just got out of Badlands Bar and Nizario's was just across the street.

She ordered a cheese pizza for $2.75 which is a pretty good deal! We shared it and I usually don't do cheese pizzas but I enjoyed Nizario's. The pizza was nice and crisp. It was very tasty and cheesy as well!

Good stuff!

excerpts: if you offered me a carnivorous feast or nizario's cheese pizza - i'd still take the pizza, but i'd still have to pause and think about it a moment.
cheese pizza.author: Ennis O.
cheese pizza.review:
it's been years since i've stepped foot in here and was in a rush tonight with a group of friends with nizario's the only place on the way.

total disappointment yet again with bland, overcooked pizza that has been out far too long.

i honestly don't know how this place get's rated any better than 2 stars. marcello's and escape from new york offer far better options, flavor, crust, and overall atmosphere.

plus all their pizza sits in the back on the oven so you can't even get a look for the freshest slice.

if you offered me a carnivorous feast or nizario's cheese pizza - i'd still take the pizza, but i'd still have to pause and think about it a moment.
